  1. 193 & 194

    15.07.2011

    Stopped by a field on the way home this evening.

  2. 192/365: .flies:hover

    12.07.2011

    I've been trying for over a week to get some pictures of these buggers. They recently turned up in our garden but they move so quickly it's been very hard to get anything decent. On Monday, though, I think I got the best I'm going to be able to, at least for now. I might try again some other time, but for now I'm fairly happy with these.

    The ones below are some of my attempts from earlier in the week.

  3. 190 & 191/365

    12.07.2011

    This was taken at a talent show just down the road from the house. I quite like it, but I'm beginning to question the black & white.

    And this one was in the car park of Touchwood Shopping Centre in Solihull. It looked quite cool on my Mac Mini and didn't need any editing, but seeing it on my Macbook makes me wish it wasn't so dark.

  4. 185-189/365

    11.07.2011

    When she wasn't ill, Steph spent a lot of last week cooking us lots of food. This meant I spent the week eating great food and spending more time on my 365 than I'm normally able to.

    He was taking pictures of the paintings on the ceiling.

  5. 183 & 184/365

    09.07.2011

    Good weekend, including a barbecue for two and a drive down to Bristol to see some family. Below is the flower of a leek that was growing in Steph's brother's garden.
